entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet muxer doesn't respect Windows symlinks #83314
    Future
  • Feature Request: Provide a base serializer for YAML #83313

Closed

  • Implement light-weight K register `ExtractMostSignificantBits` for `Vector512` #80820
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove VersionSuffix from servicing builds #83311
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "add copies" phase #83310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate ctor code. #83288
  • [mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. #82005
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Override all write/flush methods on NullTextWriter #83293
    area-System.IO
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2133439 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Constant folding for RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform) #83308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove LclVarDsc::lvExactSize and LclVarDsc::lvSIMDType #83307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
